Package org.mathoptimization.math_optimization.methods

Interface OptimizationMethod

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOptimizationMethod, BrentsMethod, DichotomyMethod, FibonacciMethod, GoldenRatioMethod, ParabolaMethod
public interface OptimizationMethod
Optimization methods interface.
See Also:
DichotomyMethod, FibonacciMethod, ParabolaMethod, GoldenRatioMethod

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void calculate()
    Each method have to implement its calculation in this method.
    java.lang.Double getMinimumArgument()
    Current minimum argument (x).
    java.lang.Double getMinimumValue()
    Current minimum value (f(x)).
    java.util.List<Parameters> getParameters()
    List of parameters used for "logging" our methods steps.
    java.lang.Double intervalLength()
    Counts current interval length.

  • Method Details

    • calculate

      void calculate()
      Each method have to implement its calculation in this method.
      Results of calculation have to be saved in `minimumArgument` and `minimum value`.
      For more information see implementations.

    • intervalLength

      java.lang.Double intervalLength()
      Counts current interval length.
      Returns:
      interval length.

    • getMinimumValue

      java.lang.Double getMinimumValue()
      Current minimum value (f(x)).
      Returns:
      current minimum value.

    • getMinimumArgument

      java.lang.Double getMinimumArgument()
      Current minimum argument (x).
      Returns:
      current minimum value.

    • getParameters

      java.util.List<Parameters> getParameters()
      List of parameters used for "logging" our methods steps.
      Returns:
      List of parameters.
